definition: everything clear and orderly (idiom); neat and tidy
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Yergin is careful in his analysis and never polemical.
sentences.chinese: 耶金的分析有条有理，绝不强硬武断。

sentences.english: Method will teach you to win time.
sentences.chinese: 有条有理会使你赢得时间。

sentences.english: Disposability goes along with the idea of everything being very cleanneatordered.
sentences.chinese: 便利在总体含义上一切东西干净，整洁，有条有理。
